summary: B-Feature western, a cowboy who snared a wild stallion & sells it to a cruel rodeo owner attempts to buy the horse back.
cast: Steve Cochran|Wildfire the Horse|Ray Teal|Bob Steele|Harry Antrim|George O'Hanlon|Sherry Jackson|Ed Hinton|William Fawcett|House Peters Jr.|Lee Roberts|Lane Chandler|Charles Stevens|Jack Williams|Tom Tyler|Billy Dix|Stephen Peck|Leon Alton|Rudy Bowman|Roy Bucko|Jess Cavin|Jack Daley|Edgar Dearing|Robert Filmer|Fred Kelsey|David O. McCall|John Merton|Jack Montgomery|Lee Morgan|Jack Mower|Frank Nelson|Artie Ortego|Murray Pollack|Sailor Vincent|Wally Walker
title: The Lion and the Horse
